query: WITH entities AS (SELECT idx, id FROM core_interest_accrual_cycles WHERE COALESCE(credit_facility_id = $1, $1 IS NULL) AND (COALESCE((idx, id) > ($4, $3), $3 IS NULL)) ORDER BY idx ASC, id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $5 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_interest_accrual_cycle_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.idx asc, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
